about_the_game:
**** Zombie War: The War That Begins Released!!! ****
Hot zombie battle with machine gun(M134), flamethrower, grenade. (FPS TPS Shooting game)
=============================
- Strategic FPS TPS Shooting game to relieve stress
- Even beginners can easily start the game at the training ground
- Machine gun (M134), flamethrower, grenade, flash grenade added
- Up to 2 remote allies (TCP/IP)
1. First, Go to Alience in the static IP server terminal and click [Listen].
2. Go to Alience from another client terminal and click [Connect] to connect to a static IP and wait.
3. Click [Start] in the static IP server terminal.

All features, including all weapons, are available!!!
===========================
In 2024, an unknown virus has passed,
Only zombies are infested on the peninsula.
We got the information that a trillion gold bars were left somewhere in Yeouido.
With various clues left everywhere
hope you find that place.\nIf you go to a place where you can see the light, you will find the previous securement bases.
Got guns and hospitals and convenience stores
You can acquire weapons, heal, and recover health
The helicopter can only go to the entrance due to electromagnetic interference..
please! I hope you find a trillion gold bars and come back alive...
Good Luck!!!
detailed_description:
**** Zombie War: The War That Begins Released!!! ****
Hot zombie battle with machine gun(M134), flamethrower, grenade. (FPS TPS Shooting game)
=============================
- Strategic FPS TPS Shooting game to relieve stress
- Even beginners can easily start the game at the training ground
- Machine gun (M134), flamethrower, grenade, flash grenade added
- Up to 2 remote allies (TCP/IP)
1. First, Go to Alience in the static IP server terminal and click [Listen].
2. Go to Alience from another client terminal and click [Connect] to connect to a static IP and wait.
3. Click [Start] in the static IP server terminal.

All features, including all weapons, are available!!!
===========================
In 2024, an unknown virus has passed,
Only zombies are infested on the peninsula.
We got the information that a trillion gold bars were left somewhere in Yeouido.
With various clues left everywhere
hope you find that place.\nIf you go to a place where you can see the light, you will find the previous securement bases.
Got guns and hospitals and convenience stores
You can acquire weapons, heal, and recover health
The helicopter can only go to the entrance due to electromagnetic interference..
please! I hope you find a trillion gold bars and come back alive...
Good Luck!!!
name: Zombie War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window7/8/9/10/11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window7/8/9/10/11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Hot zombie battle with machine gun(M134), flamethrower, grenade-FPS TPS Shooting game - Strategic FPS TPS Shooting game to relieve stress - Even beginners can easily start the game at the training center - Maximize fun with different missions in Stage 1 and Stage 2 - Up to 2 remote allies(TCP/IP)
